title: New phlog. New (final) calendar. What more do you want?!
body:
New Phlog.

New calendar (our last for the current Moxie location — we're going out with a bang!).

What more do you want?!
author: Dan

comments.author: nate
comments.body: I wish there was a way you could use that video as a new intro to the movies, Dan, hearkening back to the early days of goofy intros like kung-fu "small people" and such.  But, obviously, playing the Wehrenberg theme song would be an issue.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: The quirky intros will be back. They've just been temporarily supplanted with quirky educational shorts about our move.

comments.author: stevie_g
comments.body:
If anyone is interested, I've set up a Flickr page with my Moxie 2.0 photos on it:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/87104832@N00/sets/72157606446460571/detail/

Dan's captions on the phlog are much better though...

Enjoy!
